title: Alan Garner - The Weirdstone of Brisingamen (BBC)
description:
From BBC Radio 4. Written by Alan Garner; Full-cast dramatisation starring Robert Powell, Hugo Docking, Fern Deacon, Trevor Cooper and Rachel Atkins; Dramatised by Peter Thomson.

That harmless looking scrap of jewellery young Susan is sporting turns out to be a weirdstone, an item of such power that the forces of good and evil are about to go to war to possess it.
